how to chant apt to use a proxy instead: set a variable like this: export http_proxy="http://some.url.com"
how to undo if i have done it already?
if you want this permanently, you can add the variable setting to /etc/environment
undo: export http_proxy=''
or just end the bash shell - export only works on the current shell session
